title: How to Make Roasted Vegetable Tacos

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 400° Fahrenheit or 204° Celsius.
In a food processor, blend the broth and beans until the mixture is smooth.
On a medium-sized skillet, drizzle over the olive oil and put the stove on to medium heat.
Add the jalapeño pepper and chopped onion.
Stir in the garlic and saute for an additional minute.
Pour the pureed bean mixture and mix for about 4-5 minutes.
steps.description: Stir until properly heated and shut off the stove.

steps.headline: Spread aluminum foil on a baking sheet.
Spray the zucchini, squash, and sliced onion with cooking spray.
steps.description: Place it on the baking sheet.

steps.headline: Sprinkle the salt and pepper over the vegetables.
Bake the vegetables in the oven for about 20 minutes, flipping between baking if necessary.
Heat up the corn tortillas until they are warmed thoroughly.
Stuff the tacos.
steps.description: Add the bean mixture, baked vegetables, salsa, and cheese over each taco. Repeat with the rest of the tacos.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Place the roasted vegetable tacos on a serving plate. Garnish with extra cheese if desired and enjoy!

text: Preheat the oven to 400° Fahrenheit or 204° Celsius.  In a food processor, blend the broth and beans until the mixture is smooth. Set aside. On a medium-sized skillet, drizzle over the olive oil and put the stove on to medium heat.  Add the jalapeño pepper and chopped onion. Saute for about 4-5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and saute for an additional minute.  Pour the pureed bean mixture and mix for about 4-5 minutes. Stir until properly heated and shut off the stove. Spread aluminum foil on a baking sheet.  Spray the zucchini, squash, and sliced onion with cooking spray. Place it on the baking sheet. Sprinkle the salt and pepper over the vegetables.  Bake the vegetables in the oven for about 20 minutes, flipping between baking if necessary.  Heat up the corn tortillas until they are warmed thoroughly.  Stuff the tacos. Add the bean mixture, baked vegetables, salsa, and cheese over each taco. Repeat with the rest of the tacos. Serve. Place the roasted vegetable tacos on a serving plate. Garnish with extra cheese if desired and enjoy!
